 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָעַט‎</span>] **verb** ==swallow== (greedily) (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Hiph\`il ***stuff*** cattle with food; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***jaw***; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***speak confusedly, utter indistinct sounds***); — only **Hiph\`il** ***Imperative*** masculine singular suffix causat, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַלְעִיטֵנִי‎</span> [[Gen.25.30|Gen 25:30]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) ***let me swallow***, followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of thing.
